page.title: 08PATHHEAD:FAMILY LIFE 1
page.content:
THE COATS FAMILY 180A MAIN STREET,PATHHEAD
MR COATS - SITE AGENT MRS COATS - PLAYSCHOOL TEACHER LINDSAY COATS - PRIMARY 7 PUPIL NICOLA COATS - PRIMARY 3 PUPIL
SATURDAY 15th JUNE 1985
MR COATS
AT 09:00 MY DAD GOT UP.HE DRESSED THEN HAD HIS BREAKFAST.AT ABOUT 09:25 HE WENT DOWN TO THE FOOTBALL PITCH TO PRACTISE GOLFING.HE CAME BACK AT ABOUT 11:00.WE HAD OUR DINNER AT 13:00.MY DAD BARBECUED CHICKEN AND HAMBURGERS. AT 14:30 HE WENT TO PLAY GOLF AT NEWBATTLE GOLF CLUB.HE WAS PLAYING TWO ROUNDS OF GOLF IN TWO COMPETITIONS.HE ARRIVED HOME AT ABOUT 22:00 AND HAD
